attributes.action: Fix the carpark at banana moon day nursery, on the Naggs head roundabout.
attributes.additional_details: We have had complaints one after the other from parents, and the public as staff from the nursery. We have people say they have corroded coil springs in suspension due to the vicious nature of the potholes and damage in this car park, people have had blowouts and other damage
attributes.background: We want the car park fixing as there are potholes that are damaging cars, this is out the front of the of the banana moon day nursery, naggs head pub, san Giovanni restaurant and simpkins dentist. On the naggs head roundabout, Davyhulme circle connecting Lostock road

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about potholes in car parks are a matter for individual local authorities or individual businesses (depending on who owns the carpark) not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
